Output Valid Soccer Team Names

Source: R/utils.R
valid_names.Rd

Team names used in this function are extracted from Fotmob

Usage

valid_team_names(country)

all_valid_team_names()

Arguments

country

One of "ENG", "ESP", "FRA", "GER", "ITA", or "USA". (Names are ISO 3166 3-letter country codes.)

Value

A vector of type 'character'.

Examples

all_valid_team_names()
#> $ENG
#>  [1] "Arsenal"        "Aston Villa"    "Birmingham"     "Blackburn"     
#>  [5] "Bournemouth"    "Brentford"      "Brighton"       "Bristol City"  
#>  [9] "Burnley"        "Cardiff"        "Chelsea"        "Coventry"      
#> [13] "Crystal Palace" "Everton"        "Fulham"         "Huddersfield"  
#> [17] "Hull"           "Ipswich"        "Leeds"          "Leicester"     
#> [21] "Liverpool"      "Luton"          "Man City"       "Man United"    
#> [25] "Middlesbrough"  "Millwall"       "Newcastle"      "Norwich"       
#> [29] "Nottm Forest"   "Plymouth"       "Preston"        "QPR"

#> [37] "Stoke"          "Sunderland"     "Swansea"        "Tottenham"

#>  [1] "Arsenal"        "Aston Villa"    "Birmingham"     "Blackburn"     
#>  [5] "Bournemouth"    "Brentford"      "Brighton"       "Bristol City"
